'''Erelas''' was the fourth of the seven [[warning beacons of Gondor|Beacon-hills]] of [[Gondor]], which ran west from [[Minas Tirith]] on the northern side of the [[White Mountains]] that looked down on the plains of [[Anórien]].<ref name=Map>{{RK|Map}}</ref>

==Description==
Erelas was was a green hill without trees.<ref name=VT42>{{VT|42a}}, ''The Names of the Beacon hills'', entry '''''Erelas''''', p. 19</ref><ref name=NM>{{NM|P3xxii}}, ''The Names of the Beacon hills'', entry ''Erelas'', p. 391</ref><ref name=Index>{{UT|Index}}, entry ''Erelas''</ref> While the fourth beacon-hill, its beacon was small and was not always lit. The lighting of its beacon was a signal of great urgency.<ref name=VT42/><ref name=NM/> The Beacon-hills from [[Amon Anwar|Halifirien]] (the westernmost and seventh Beacon-hill) to [[Nardol]] (the third Beacon-hill) were situated along a shallow curve that bent a little southward so that the three Beacon-hills between them, [[Calenhad]], [[Min-Rimmon]] and Erelas did not block the view.<ref>{{VT|42a}}, ''The Names of the Beacon hills'', entry '''''Eilenach and Eilenaer''''', p. 19</ref><ref>{{NM|P3xxii}}, ''The Names of the Beacon hills'', entry ''Eilenach and Eilenaer'', p. 390</ref> The beacon-fire on Nardol could be seen from Halifirien on a clear night.<ref>{{UT|8e}}, note 51</ref>

==History==
On the night of [[7 March]] {{TA|3019}},<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 509</ref> [[Gandalf]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]], riding eastward on [[Shadowfax]], saw the beacons being lit to call for aid from Rohan.<ref>{{RK|MT}}, p. 747</ref>

On [[11 March]] {{TA|3019}},<ref>{{App|Great}}, entry for the year 3019, March 11, p. 1093</ref><ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 542</ref> when King [[Théoden]] of Rohan rode with the [[Rohirrim]] and [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] through through Anórien on his ride to the aid of Minas Tirith, the signal fire on Erelas was no longer lit.<ref>{{RK|Muster}}, p. 805</ref>

==Etymology==
Despite being [[Sindarin]] in style, ''Erelas'' has no suitable Sindarin meaning.<ref name=VT42/><ref name=NM/> It is probably a [[pre-Númenórean]] name,<ref name=Index/> but it is not recorded from which language the name ''Erelas'' was taken, nor what it means.

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2015: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Erelas is located in the [[Beacon-hills]], across the river to the west from the [[Drúadan Forest]]. The hill of Erelas is much smaller than of nearby Beacon-hills [[Nardol]] and [[Min-Rimmon]]. A small village of a few household sits just to the east of the beacon.
